section.title: HW: Terrance Tao and the Fields Medal

question.title: Who has won the Fields Medal?

statement.p: Research a person who won the Fields Medal (other than Terence Tao). Who are they? Where are they from? And for what reason did the earn the Fields Medal?

subsection.title: Terrance Tao
subsection.p: Terence Tao, professor of mathematics at UCLA, is one of the Fields Medal recipients, and he may be the greatest mathematician of his generation. Among Tao's incredible accomplishments is that he learned university-level Calculus by the age of 9!

statement.p: Read the UCLA article, Terrance Tao, 'Mozart of Math', is the first UCLA prof to win Fields Medal.
Tao seems to be in a tier of his own in the mathematics world. List three aspects of Tao that seem to mesmerize mathematicians of the world.
